attributes.action: To revise treatment of Kent as a single region in conferring Tier status
attributes.additional_details: Today's announcement which establishes Tier three status for the whole if Kent is massively disproportionate to the risk in a large area of the county. As can be seen from the current map, the area of South West Kent from Sevenoaks to Folkestone is below the average for the UK - sometimes well below. It is economically suicidal and totally unnecessary to lump the whole county together.
attributes.background: Divide Kent into two areas to more properly reflect the incidence of CV.

rejection.details: You may wish to sign this petition calling for the same action: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/562004
